website_summaries.verdict: These A4-size sheets should cover even the largest reading materials.
pros: A4-size sheet should cover most pages
Lots of color choices so you can experiment
Sheets can be cut down to size
cons: Some may find the sheets too thick

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for me to see through
customer_reviews.text: After reading for 30 minutes my eyes get so blurry I gave to stop. In the past, I’ve used a bluish turquoise overlay and been able to read for hours. I’m sorry to report that your overlays are too thick and I can’t see through them enough to read.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hendryx

customer_reviews.title: Migraine
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has migraines and reading and eye strain can trigger a headache. One of her teachers recommended that we try this product. It works great! She can now read without triggering a headache. She is very happy! Great product, fast delivery, One very happy dad.
customer_reviews.author: Graavis

customer_reviews.title: A Thumbs Up Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Having Irlen syndrome reading films are a must for me to get by in the world. I lean towards light red & orange and this pack includes those films. They do scratch rather easily but at the price you pay for this type of product I'm really not too worried about replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaleah

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who is dyslexic and who had not heard that color overlays will help reading ability. I heard about 50 years ago that overlays would help when it was apparently first discovered. So, I bought these for my friend who says the orange one helped her the most.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My adult student with dyslexia really felt it helped to read more easily.
customer_reviews.text: Put over book she was reading and she felt it made the print easier to read. She had to experiment with the colors and found that yellow and green worked best for her.
customer_reviews.author: valerie wolff

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this brand new package and took the plastic off, I was shocked to discover that every single overlay was scratched. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Not a happy customer

customer_reviews.title: My 9yr old struggles with reading
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using the sheets along with the book marks to follow along with reading work. I see a difference when he is using the sheets from when he does not. These really help more than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Cauline Gies

customer_reviews.title: These help with focused reading
customer_reviews.text: For my adhd daughter to help her focus on her reading
customer_reviews.author: Amy T Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great for dyslexic kids
customer_reviews.text: Dyslexic son LOVES THEM. Helps him with his tests instead of being distracted by the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: they are nice and thick, heavy duty for our 7 yr old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The overlays are thick and the variety of colors was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaxstarr

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality! They are thick and not ultra-slim. Excited to use them with my son!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Color Overlays for Reading
customer_reviews.text: I am a 4th grade special education teacher. These color overlays seem to help my students with reading disabilities. The text seems to pop out more clearly and they seem to maintain focus better. The kids choose colors that seem to work best for them and they enjoy using them. I would definitely purchase this product again. The seller was also prompt and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Singleton

customer_reviews.title: There are other options
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with creases in the product, also haziness not very clear to read with.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

product_meta.title: 10 x A4 Colour Overlays to Aid/Support/Help Reading. Excellent Reading Tools for Dyslexia, Irlen's Syndrome, ADHD and to Reduce Visual Stress
feature_bullets: ✅ 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗜𝗘𝗥 - The gentle tinted color overlay helps make letters and words easier to see, helping to reduce visual stress and tiredness, improve concentration and make reading faster and more comfortable.

💚🔴🔵💛 𝟭𝟬 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗧𝗢 𝗠𝗘𝗘𝗧 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗜𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗨𝗔𝗟 𝗡𝗘𝗘𝗗𝗦/𝗦𝗨𝗜𝗧 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬 𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗜𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗨𝗔𝗟'𝗦 𝗡𝗘𝗘𝗗𝗦 - This pack contains 10 colors so you can experiment and quickly find out which colour benefits you the most. You can even use the page overlays together to merge the colours to find what works best for you. (Aqua, Sky, Yellow, Grass, Celery, Jade, Orange, Purple, Pink, Magenta)

✅𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗔𝗜𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗗𝗬𝗦𝗟𝗘𝗫𝗜𝗔, 𝗜𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗡𝗦 𝗦𝗬𝗡𝗗𝗥𝗢𝗠𝗘, 𝗔𝗗𝗛𝗗 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗔𝗖𝗬 𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗩𝗘𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 - Research has shown that colored tint in overlays can really help to reduce visual stress, improving reader's ability to focus on words, reduce tiredness & improve their reading speed. Colored overlays are commonly used/often the first step to support readers with additional learning needs/special educational needs & anyone experiencing challenges with literacy.

✅ 𝗔𝟰 𝗦𝗜𝗭𝗘 - The size of the overlays and ample coverage they offer make them suitable for a variety of texts and documents used in education, at home or in the work place, including: textbooks, exam papers, invoices, reports, letters, exercise books etc.
💳 𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗔𝗟 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗦 - Overlays are useful and effective reading aids for children/kids, teens or adults at home, in the work place or in schools and colleges
